portrait_<token>: a professional portrait photograph of <token> with natural lighting, high quality, detailed features
casual_<token>: a casual, candid photograph of <token> in everyday clothing, natural pose, soft lighting
artistic_<token>: an artistic portrait of <token> with dramatic lighting and creative composition, professional photography
cinematic_<token>: a cinematic portrait photograph of <token> with movie-style lighting and depth of field
studio_<token>: a studio portrait of <token> with professional lighting setup, clean background, high resolution
outdoor_<token>: an outdoor portrait of <token> in natural environment, golden hour lighting, beautiful scenery
close_up_<token>: a close-up portrait focusing on the facial features of <token>, sharp details, professional quality
full_body_<token>: a full-body portrait photograph of <token> standing naturally, good proportions, clear details
